column5: WOW good ppl, good food, and lot of carp! NICE! must of been a blast! is this yearly event?
Yep, this is my second year now. Always a good time.  Now that I have the proper gear I am going to try all over the place for Carp, they are literally everywhere in southern ontario.
wow,great report! Looks like you had a blast and congrats on all the fish

A great report Tony. Yes Long Sault is  certainly one of the carp hot spots. I camped there a couple of times last summer. Fairly clean water too. From our campsite we could sometimes see a US patrol boat with a gun mounted on the front. :-) I think it's probably illegal to fish that way though.
